abstract.original_text: Disorders of movement can present to the emergency department as new complaints or as an exacerbation of a known condition.

sentences.segment_text: Disorders of movement can present to the emergency department as new complaints or as an exacerbation of a known condition .

abstract.original_text: Without a prior diagnosis, the etiologies of movement disorders are diffi cult to differentiate.
